attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In 1997, the British economy was broken, millions had suffered unemployment, and the country had lost its heart. Blair has restored economy to so many people and given this country a chance it had lost.

Blair should not be bullied and pushed into resigning. Thatcher made that error and it was a bad one. 

Blair is needed to further the plans he started, especially reform in the Lords and Buckingham Palace; Local Government; and education.

Stand by Blair, tell him to stay.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
